name: 1Sneakyboi
description:
1SneakyBoi Is a  "Stealth"  game in which the goal is to collect all the key and escape. 1SneakyBoi  is based on the theme of the BenBonk gamejam "Trust No One"

Music  by Evan King. Other than that everything is made by me.

Hi, im Snootnoot a new hobbiest gamedev if you enjoyed(or didn't) please leave any feedback and/or constructive criticism. Thanks
